title: Hydrific Announces Launch and Commitment to Enabling Sustainable Homes of the Future - PR Newswire
summary: Hydrific, a venture backed by LIXIL, aims to address the growing water crisis by empowering consumers with information and tools to make saving water easy and enjoyable. Hydrific's focus on water sustainability comes at a critical time, as U.S. water consumption has tripled in the past 50 years and at least 40 states are projected to face water shortages by 2024. Hydrific's sustainable smart home technologies aim to make water conservation simple and accessible for homeowners, tenants, and utilities.

business_innovation: TRUE, Hydrific's sustainable smart home technologies are business innovations because they are new products that differ significantly from the firm's previous products and have been introduced to the market.

title: Watts Water Technologies pressure vacuum breaker backflow preventors - Supply House Times
summary: Watts Water Technologies is now offering connection-capable freeze sensors as a standard feature on their Series 800 pressure vacuum breaker backflow preventers. These sensors can be integrated with Building Management Systems (BMS) and Irrigation Management Systems (IMS) to send freeze alerts when temperatures drop, enabling users to take action and prevent costly freeze damage. This innovation combines green innovation and business innovation by addressing environmental concerns and offering cost-saving benefits to users.
green_innovation: TRUE, as the innovation contributes to environmental sustainability by preventing water waste and reducing the risk of freeze damage.
business_innovation: TRUE, as the innovation introduces a new feature (connection-capable freeze sensors) that significantly differs from the company's previous products and offers new benefits to users (freeze alerts and remote monitoring).
green_product: TRUE, as the innovation involves a product (pressure vacuum breaker backflow preventer) that is designed to reduce water waste and prevent freeze damage, which are both environmentally beneficial outcomes.
green_process: FALSE, as the article does not describe a specific process that is being implemented or improved.

title: When it comes to sustainability and stewardship, tell your own story - TurfNet
summary: Golf courses are often unfairly targeted as being environmentally unfriendly, but in reality, many golf courses are at the forefront of environmental stewardship.  Two golf course superintendents are using their positions to educate their communities about what they do to protect the environment.  One superintendent has been invited to join a town sustainability committee, where he can share his expertise and advocate for golf courses.

title: Integration, expansion and smarter factories: AM in 2024 - VoxelMatters
summary: The article discusses various trends and developments expected in the additive manufacturing (AM) industry in 2024, including increased adoption, advancements in materials, larger and faster printers, sustainability, customization, and regulatory changes.  Experts in the industry believe that AI will play a significant role in modernizing manufacturing and that there will be a greater transition towards smart factories, with increased integration of AI, 5G, Internet of Things (IoT), data analytics, and cloud computing. title: 6 Food Trends That We Predict Will Reign Supreme in 2024 - PureWow
summary: In 2024, plant-based foods will continue to gain popularity, with mushrooms, walnuts, tempeh, and legumes becoming increasingly popular. High-protein foods, such as tinned fish, cottage cheese, and Icelandic yogurt, are also on the rise, as more people look to add more protein to their diets.

title: Spinneys unveils 2030 sustainability strategy, targets net zero operations by 2040 - ZAWYA
summary: Spinneys, a leading UAE premium fresh food retailer, launched its sustainability strategy, 'Better Together 2030'. The strategy aims to make Spinneys a more sustainable business by focusing on five pillars: Eat Well, Live Well; Sourcing for the Future; No Time to Waste; Inspired People, Stronger Together; and Embedding Sustainability. Spinneys has committed to reducing greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions and achieving Net Zero by 2040.
green_innovation: TRUE, Spinneys' sustainability strategy includes a focus on climate action, energy and emissions management, circular economy practices, biodiversity conservation, logistics and transport efficiency, water conservation, and the implementation of sustainable practices in stores and facilities.
business_innovation: TRUE, Spinneys' sustainability strategy includes a focus on product quality, nutrition, customer communications, product ranges, sustainability standards and food safety.
green_product: TRUE, Spinneys' sustainability strategy includes a focus on sustainably sourced products and ingredients, food miles, local and transparent sourcing and a commitment to food security.
green_process: TRUE, Spinneys' sustainability strategy includes a focus on climate action, energy and emissions management, circular economy practices, biodiversity conservation, logistics and transport efficiency, water conservation, and the implementation of sustainable practices in stores and facilities.
